They describe it as flattering, with one mentioning it shows off curves without being too revealing, and consider it good value for money. items.author: Jenn Nowak

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning
items.body: I bought this dress for my teenager, and she absolutely loves it! The gothic floral mesh design is beautiful â€” it has just the right mix of edgy and elegant. The material feels soft and lightweight, and the floral jacquard detailing gives it a really pretty texture. It fits her nicely and has a flattering shape without being too revealing, which I really appreciate as a parent. Sheâ€™s already worn it to a couple of events and got so many compliments! It looks great with boots or platform shoes and layers easily with a jacket or cardigan. For the price, the quality is excellent â€” nothing about it feels cheap. If your teen likes that modern gothic or Y2K-inspired look, this dress is a total win. Read more
items.author: Nikki

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: Great quality and such a pretty dress. Bought it for a Halloween costume but it's so cute and comfortable that it'll be a great dress for fall in general. It is a little on the short side but I just made sure to wear shorts underneath Read more
items.author: Nicole Garofalo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stretchy.
items.body: super cute and good material. the chest seam is a little small for me, but it's pretty stretchy so it doesn't smush or hurt. if you have over a C cup definitely size up. Read more
items.author: C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit amd stylish
items.body: I am super impressed. This dress looks great on and perfect for an Edgar Allen Poe reading. I plan to wear it for date nights as it makes me look super trim and young. Read more
items.author: Wendy Coyne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, soft, breezy, and SLEEVES GALORE!
items.body: This is now one of my favorite dresses! I am 5'9" so it is a BIT short on the backside but it doesnt detract from its comfort and beauty. I loved how it fit (close and comfortable!) And how soft the material ended up being. The tie on the back prevents the shoulders from falling and I appreciate that so much! Insecurity was demolished in this (especially being postpartum!) which feels like the biggest win for me. I LOVE the flowy and flappy sleeves so MUCH!!!! Might get it in another color now that I have this one. Read more
items.author: Natalie Laubach

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy and comfy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Very cute,fits true to size For Reference I am 5'3 140# 36D fit perfect I received the blue n blk dress today No tags dog hair on it n both bell sleeves have gross stuff on both. Totally Disgusted since I waited a while for this dress to reach me. Im returning and I'm praying I receive a new 1 next time since I paid $45.00 plus. Received my replacement Its perfect with tags n clean I realized the burgandy didnt have tags either ,but atleast it was clean. Love these dressess n theres a few more I want. Read more
items.author: Gemini

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White Plain, Blue, Deep Red, Burgundy, Deep Black, Army Green, Black, Coffee Brown, Rusty Rose, Pure Black, White, Beige, Purple, Black and Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
